amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Housing for the Elderly by $2.5 million and reduces funding for Policy Development and Research by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Housing for the Elderly by $2,500,000 and reduce funding for Policy Development and Research by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A035) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Grayson.
